welcome_message_body: Welcome to Grand Terrace, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. We invite you to explore our city and enjoy all it has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Riverside Fla-Bob Airport, where most commercial flights operate.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and chartered flights at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Norton AFB Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Norton AFB Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the Wi-Fi network for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport offers a variety of amenities for passengers, including a cafe, gift shop, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cable Airport is available for private and chartered flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized travel experience.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ryan Field Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ryan Field Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
